Class StrategyManager<Strategy extends IStrategy>

java.lang.Object
  ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.strategies.StrategyManager<Strategy>
Type Parameters:
Strategy -
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterDetectionStrategyManager, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyManager, PostprocessingStrategyManager, PreprocessingStrategyManager
public abstract class StrategyManager<Strategy extends IStrategy>
extends Object

Abstract Base Class for a class managing objects implementing IStrategy.

Author:
Julian Hanhart, Dominik Giger
See Also:
PreprocessingStrategyManager, MicroGestureDetectionStrategyManager, CharacterDetectionStrategyManager, PostprocessingStrategyManager
